Hub Certification Requirement for Court-Appointed Fiduciaries
When a court appoints a guardian for an eligible beneficiary, do not make payments to the guardian until the hub furnishes a
VA Form 21P-555
.
After receiving court documents indicating the appointment of a fiduciary from anyone other than the hub,
